name: Shooter (Ashu05)
description:
A 2D top-down shooter with soothing graphics. The story is about a comrade who wants to conquer the whole game-world and in the process goes on conquering every level by killing the enemies who try to kill him. Comrade has a special weapon inbuilt in his body and has hidden superpowers(which the player has to find himself). Try it out and suggest us new features.

Instagram :- Instagram
